'''''Chakana's Dangling Bough''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Mortal Travails: Series V]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to collect the entire "[[Records of Hanan Pacha]]" series.

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{Lang|{{w|Chakana}}|qu=Tawa Chakana}} is a stepped cross motif used by the {{w|Inca Empire|Inca}} and pre-incan Andean societies.
